name: Terence SIM Associate Professor
research: Dr. Terence Sim's research spans several areas related to Biometrics and Visual Computing, including Multimodal biometrics, Deepfake synthesis and detection, Facial image analysis and rendering, Continuous authentication, combining machine learning with physics-based modeling and graphics rendering.
prospective_students: Prospective students are encouraged to approach Dr. Terence Sim for guidance on research opportunities, consultancy in biometrics, and potential involvement in his research projects.
